Draft Rating:

B-

Isiah Thomas ranks in the 66th percentile for drafting among executives in our database. Thomas's draft picks average out to be worth the equivalent of 2 spots higher than they were picked due to his good drafting.
Some of their biggest wins:
  • Drafted Tracy McGrady with 9th pick but was worth 2th pick.
  • Drafted Trevor Ariza with 43th pick but was worth 7th pick.
  • Drafted David Lee with 30th pick but was worth 5th pick.
Some of their biggest busts:
  • Drafted Marcus Camby with 2th pick but was worth 5th pick.
  • Drafted Wilson Chandler with 23th pick but was worth 41th pick.
  • Drafted Channing Frye with 8th pick but was worth 36th pick.

Trade Rating:

F

Isiah Thomas ranks in the 8th percentile for trading among executives in our database.
Their biggest win:
  • Added Anfernee Hardaway, Stephon Marbury, Cezary Trybański to NYK.
  • Lost Howard Eisley, Maciej Lampe, Antonio McDyess, Charlie Ward, Kirk Snyder, Gordon Hayward to PHO.
Their biggest L:
  • Added Eddy Curry, Antonio Davis, Wilson Chandler to NYK.
  • Lost Jermaine Jackson, Mike Sweetney, Tim Thomas, LaMarcus Aldridge, Joakim Noah, Kyrylo Fesenko, Jon Brockman to CHI.

Signing Rating:

F-

Isiah Thomas ranks in the 2th percentile for free agency signings among executives in our database.
Their best signings:
  • Signed Walt Williams in 1996.
Their worst signings:
  • Signed Jared Jeffries in 2006.
  • Signed Reggie Slater in 1997.
  • Signed Jerome James in 2005.
